attractions.name: Hakone Open-Air Museum
attractions.description: An outdoor museum featuring sculptures, artwork, and a Picasso Pavilion surrounded by nature.

attractions.name: Lake Ashi
attractions.description: A scenic crater lake with boat cruises offering views of Mount Fuji on clear days.

attractions.name: Hakone Shrine
attractions.description: Historic Shinto shrine famous for its red torii gate standing in Lake Ashi.

attractions.name: Owakudani Valley
attractions.description: Volcanic valley with hot springs, sulfur vents, and the famous black eggs boiled in volcanic water.

attractions.name: Hakone Ropeway
attractions.description: A scenic aerial lift offering panoramic views of Hakone, Owakudani, and Mount Fuji.
